source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic time-lapse video of a park with a large floral clock and a white stupa. The camera glides forward along a brick path, moving closer to the clock and the stupa in the background. The sped-up motion of people walking around the park indicates this is a time-lapse or hyper-lapse shot.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic time-lapse video of a park with a large floral clock and a white stupa. The camera glides forward along a brick path, moving closer to the clock and the stupa in the background. The sped-up motion of people walking around the park indicates this is a time-lapse or hyper-lapse shot.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several cyclists ride past the floral clock during the time-lapse, as this detail helps clarify the types of motion occurring in the park.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic time-lapse video of a park with a large floral clock and a white stupa. The camera glides forward along a brick path, moving closer to the clock and the stupa in the background. Several cyclists ride past the floral clock, adding to the sped-up motion of people walking around the park, indicating this is a time-lapse or hyper-lapse shot.
